success.title: Email Sent Successfully!
success.subtitle: We sent a link to reset your password. Check your inbox and spam folder.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.step1: Check your email inbox (including spam/junk folder)
nextSteps.step2: Look for an email from Neural Content with the subject 'Reset Your Password'
nextSteps.step3: Click the 'Reset Password' button in the email
nextSteps.step4: Create your new password on the secure page that opens
nextSteps.step5: Return to the login page and sign in with your new password
